long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple way to export past purchase history from Amazon and past view history from Netflix.

 Supported Amazon Domains Include:
  amazon.com
  amazon.com.br
  amazon.ca
  amazon.com.mx
  amazon.cn
  amazon.in
  amazon.co.jp
  amazon.sg
  amazon.ae
  amazon.sa
  amazon.fr
  amazon.de
  amazon.it
  amazon.nl
  amazon.pl
  amazon.es
  amazon.se
  amazon.com.tr
  amazon.co.uk
  amazon.com.au
